name: Backup Configuration
content:
---
- name: Backup device configuration
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Backup running config
      ios_config:
        backup: yes
        backup_options:
          filename: "{{inventory_hostname}}-{{ansible_date_time.date}}.cfg"

steps.name: Backup Config
steps.content:
---
- name: Backup device configuration
  hosts: all
  tasks:
    - name: Backup running config
      ios_config:
        backup: yes
